document.title: Reduction of Circuit SAT to SAT
Reduction of Circuit SAT to SAT

subtitle.dupnames: reduction\ of\ circuit\ sat\ to\ sat

document.subtitle: Reduction of Circuit SAT to SAT
document.comment: This file is part of the OpenDSA eTextbook project. See

document.paragraph: The following slideshow shows that an instance of Circuit Satisfiability problem can be reduced to an instance of SAT problem in polynomial time.
This reduction can help in providing an NP Completeness proof for SAT.
